title: Stay Fat-Free for Life
message: Transform your body in just 6 months. Start today!

quote: Your body is the only place you have to live.
story: I heard this in college when I was in bad shape. It changed my life.

journey: Now, fitness and nutrition are my passion. I teach fitness on YouTube and have coached over 10 people.
feeling: I love my work and wouldn't trade it for anything else.

meaning: It represents my journey from being unhealthy to fit.

belief: Your body is your home. Taking care of it is personal and important.
